text: Add the shortening to a mixing bowl. Cream well. Gradually add the sugar to shortening and cream until light and fluffy.  Add the beaten egg, milk and vanilla. Beat until light. Whisk together the dry ingredients.  Add the dry ingredients to the shortening mixture. Stir well. Chill dough if needed. It is recommended that you chill the dough before rolling out for ease of handling. Roll out dough until it is thin.  Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Cut out small round, square or diamond shapes.  Spread a bit of jam onto each cookie.  Top with another cookie. Press dough edges to seal. Bake cookies until golden.  Finished.
